name: Tree of Savior - JUNE 2020 OST Collection

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Tree of Savior (English Ver.) Soundtrack - $19.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Tree of Savior - JUNE 2020 OST Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 649 MB available space

short_description: Tree of Savior 2020 June collection provides 16 different tracks, including exclusive soundtrack only available on DLC.
